fields.name: BRAZILIAN YELLOW BOURBON
fields.description: The best Brazilian coffees have a relatively low acidity, and exhibits a nutty sweet flavor, often bittersweet with a chocolaty roast taste. ... The most favorable quality of a Brazilian coffee is its price - but after that, the mildness helps to balance out more intense coffee beans, making it a feature of many blends.

fields.name: Full Circle - Brazil - Sao Joao
fields.description: This coffee really has come full circle for us! It was one of the first coffees we had on our website this time last year! It's yet another classic Brazilian from Nat in Full Circle and not to be missed! Expect a lovely rich chocolaty and nutty coffee with some malic acidity too!

fields.name: Origin Coffee - Nicaragua, Los Altos, Washed Coffee Beans
fields.description: Los Altos is a geographically dynamic farm composed of just over 70 hectares of rolling coffee hills at the base of Kilambe Mountain. Each time we arrive at Los Altos, we're greeted by the workers that come together to create this incredible crop, from coffee growers to pickers. The relationship between the Mierisch family and Origin started over a decade ago and the coffee produced at their farms, especially Los Altos, has been at the core of who we are for years.

fields.name: Orfeo Coffee Nicaragua Fancy SHG coffee beans
fields.description: Only the best Nicaraguan Arabica beans grown in high altitudes find their way into this unique blend. Their exquisite and delicate taste, provides a special balance and a sweet-smelling aroma reminiscent of caramel and chocolate.

fields.name: Nicaragua Coffee - Whole Bean Coffee - Freshly Roasted Coffee - Cubico Coffee
fields.description: 100% Nicaragua Segovia Coffee - Organically cultivated in the Northeastern region of Nicaragua.Freshly Roasted Nicaraguan Beans - Cubico Coffees are roasted in small batches and our roasters sign and date each bag to ensure freshness.

fields.name: BEWLEY'S RICH ROAST GROUND COFFEE
fields.description: Bewley's Rich Roast Ground Coffee is a dark roast with a rich fruity flavour and velvety consistency. This product is Fairtrade certified and purchased at a premium from a number of Fairtrade farms.

fields.name: Taylors Of Harrogate Rich Italian Ground Coffee
fields.description: Ciao Amici - this elegant coffee takes you to the cobbles of Northern Italy. Inspired by the local roast style, it delivers rich flavours of dark chocolate and almond. It's seriously refined and dazzling after-dinner. Everything we do at Taylors is devoted to thrilling your taste buds. We individually roast each blend to its perfect point on a scale of 3 to 7, from light and gentle to dark and intense. We’re an independent family tea and coffee company from Harrogate in Yorkshire.

fields.name: BRAZIL FINE CUP FAIRTRADE GROUND COFFEE
fields.description: Bewley’s Brazil Fine Cup Fairtrade Ground Coffee is Fairtrade certified and purchased at a premium from a number of Fairtrade farms

fields.name: Roastworks Coffee Co Ltd. Ethiopia Ground Coffee
fields.description: Speciality grade Arabica coffee Roasted in a way to highlight the coffee's intrinsic qualities. A very unique coffee with a soft acidity and notes of apricot, jasmine and a hint of Earl accentuating a light, tea-like finish. Roastworks is an independent speciality coffee roaster based in Devon. Just like with wine, the type of coffee variety, where it’s grown and how it’s processed will have a profound impact on the way it tastes. As a speciality coffee roaster we are committed to highlighting these intrinsic qualities and defining coffee, not by strength, but by flavour. Our range offers customers an accessible and comprehensive introduction to better coffee. It’s time to raise your coffee game.

fields.name: True Natural Goodness Organic Dark Roast Ground Coffee
fields.description: True Natural Goodness Organic Dark Roast Ground Coffee is a strong, intense coffee that can be enjoyed by all coffee lovers. It has pronounced smoky overtones, with notes of dark cocoa. This organic ground coffee has been ethically sourced and as with all of True Natural Goodness products, it is a high quality product, without the big price tag. This complex coffee is perfect to help you relax and unwind after dinner. This product is certified organic and Fairtrade.

fields.name: Cafe Direct Machu Picchu Organic Fairtrade Ground Coffee
fields.description: A richer, smoother tasting coffee with overtones of fine, dark chocolate.A perfect excuse for a top up.This fine arabica coffee is grown at high altitude deep in the inca heartlands of the Andes.

fields.name: Velo Coffee Roasters - Fincos Los Papales 200g Coffee Bag Nicaragua
fields.description: Introducing our new Nicaragua bean with complex and fruity flavours. It has delicious flavours of rhubarb, grapefruit and fruity syrup with black tea finish. The complex flavours create an amazing cup that will keep you interested until the last sip.

fields.name: Bialetti Moka Express 6-Cup Stovetop
fields.description: Bialetti's distinctive 8-sided aluminium pot features a 3-part system that uses pressurised steam to push the boiling water up through the coffee : a lower water chamber, a filter coffee basket and a top chamber for the brewed coffee

fields.name: AeroPress Coffee Maker
fields.description: One of the quickest and simplest ways to brew really excellent coffee, resulting in a smooth, complex cup in as little as thirty seconds.

fields.name: Bodum - Chambord French Press 3 Cup
fields.description: The Bodum Chambord is a true original – the classic french press coffee maker designed in the fifties. The iconic design, now synonymous with the Bodum name, dates back to the 1930s. The Italian, Attilo Calimani, developed the principle behind this product during the 1930s. Bodum acquired Melior-Martin in 1991 and brought this icon to households worldwide. The Bodum Chambord was then further developed and improved to what it is today. It is an easy, practical method for brewing coffee. A favourite method of many. Product Features Brand: Bodum Range: Chambord Body Material: Heat-Resistant Borosilicate Glass Frame Material: Chrome-Plated Stainless Steel Handle & Lid Material: Plastic Filter Material: Stainless Steel Filter Lifespan: Permanent Colour: Silver Size: 3 Cup Capacity: 12oz

fields.name: Chemex Classic Coffeemaker
fields.description: The Chemex coffeemaker, together with Chemex-Bonded Coffee Filter, makes perfect coffee. Clear, pure, flavorful and without bitterness or sediment every time. The coffee only comes in contact with the scientifically designed filter and non-porous glass. With the Chemex method, you can make coffee as strong as you like without bitterness. Perfect for iced coffee and coffee flavoring for gourmet recipes.
